data.text:
Congratulations to all the participants who will take part in Break The Room‚Äôs flagship mid-level writers room! We are proud to partner with Break the Room (BTR) on this initiative! BTR will be working with #WBDAccess x The Canadian Academy Writers Program alum Shakil Jessa, with the support of six other writers, to further develop his pilot Love Me Back. The writers will be put to task in a live development writers room where they will break story and do punch up. Congratulations to the team! Writers: ‚û°Ô∏è Shakil Jessa (IG: shakiljessa.pdf) ‚û°Ô∏è Qaseem Fazal (IG: qaseemf) ‚û°Ô∏è Neha Kohli (IG: nehakohli__) ‚û°Ô∏è Mily Mumford (IG: milygrams) ‚û°Ô∏è Kashif Pasta (IG: kashifpasta) ‚û°Ô∏è Shyam Valera (IG: shyamvalera) ‚û°Ô∏è Adam Hussein (IG: adamh11) // F√©licitations √† tous les participants qui prendront part au programme phare de Break The Room (BTR), une salle d‚Äô√©criture pour sc√©naristes √©tablis ! Notre √©quipe est fi√®re de s‚Äôassocier √† Break the Room (BTR) pour cette initiative ! BTR travaillera avec Shakil Jessa (@shakiljessa.pdf), un ancien participant du programme pour sc√©naristes #WBDAccess x Acad√©mie canadienne, avec le soutien de six autres sc√©naristes pour d√©velopper son pilote Love Me Back. Les sc√©naristes seront mis √† contribution dans une salle o√π ils devront d√©cortiquer l'histoire et relever le script. F√©licitations √† toute l'√©quipe ! #BreaktheRoom #BreaktheRoomnow #WritersProgram #EpisodicLab #EpisodicTV #WarnerBrosDiscovery #WBD #WBDAccess #WBDAccessCanada #AccessCanada #ShapeYourStoryHere #HollywoodNorth #Film #SeizeTheOpportunity #DiversityEmpowered #InclusionMatters #RepresentationMatters

**Update: unfortunately, due to unforeseen circumstances, this event has been canceled.** of my (many) weird quirks is reading movie credits. I often glance through them looking for South Asian/Muslim sounding names. For a long time, I would mostly have luck in animation, graphics and sounds section. Occasionally I would see them in the cast for supporting roles, and often these were stereotypical roles - your casual convenience store owner, taxi driver or more commonly, a peace-disturbing individual. But the tide is changing now. These familiar names are now appearing more - in the main cast in mainstream movies and even in movie direction. Some have made it and are now opening doors for others. That is why I am so excited for Voices of Muslim Women Foundation's next event, ‚ÄúMaking It‚Äù where we get a chance to experience the journey with two film industry superstars. Aliza Vellani, actress and producer, and Kashif Pasta, director, writer and producer, are sitting down together for the first time to give us a glimpse. If you are in the Lower Mainland, interested in film or arts, or need some inspiration to ‚Äúmake it‚Äù in the industry, join us on Feb 25 in Riverport Cinemas in Richmond for a movie, some snacks and an interesting discussion. Tickets are at https://lnkd.in/gCyDiBKy and only $20 if you use our Promocode VMWFilm #representationmatters #womenempowerment #film #womeninfilm

Excited to share that I am hiring a Senior Financial Analyst for my team! Disney Streaming Marketing Finance supports Disney+, Hulu, ESPN+ and STAR+. We are responsible for the budgeting and forecasting for Brand and Content Marketing across platforms. We are looking critical thinkers who are passionate about the entertainment industry! If you or someone you know is interested, please apply using the link below! Feel free to send me a message on LinkedIn if you have any questions. #streaming #hiring #finance #contentmarketing #brandmarketing #entertainmentindustry #marketing https://lnkd.in/gQZjhmT7

I‚Äôm so happy to share that I celebrated two career milestones last week: my one year anniversary at Disney and my promotion to Finance Manager! This year has been an Incredicoaster of emotions, from meeting some of my creative heroes, including Pete Docter and Loren Bouchard, to working alongside some of the best in the industry. And all in the same year Ms. Marvel came to Disney+!‚ö°Ô∏è Special thank you to my amazing leaders Nicole Lee, Jeppe H√∏gh Degnbol and Matthew Kambic for your support on this journey üíï I‚Äôm so excited for what this next year will bring, iA! #career #disney #streaming #alhamdulillah #finance #thankyou #milestones #disneystreaming
